cards.title: Building Reactive Spring Boot Applications with Kotlin Coroutines and RSocket
cards.description: The tutorial shows you how to build a simple chat application using Spring Boot and Kotlin. You will learn about the benefits of using Kotlin for server-side development from a syntax perspective.

cards.title: Building Web Applications with React and Kotlin/JS
cards.description:
Create a React Application using Kotlin/JS, and see how you can leverage
Kotlin's type system, library ecosystem, and interoperability features.

cards.title: Building Web Applications with Spring Boot and Kotlin
cards.description: This tutorial shows you how to build efficiently a sample blog application by combining the power of Spring Boot and Kotlin.

cards.title: Creating HTTP APIs with Ktor
cards.description: Create a backend API for your application that responds to HTTP requests.

cards.title: Creating a WebSocket Chat with Ktor
cards.description: Learn how to create a simple Chat application using Ktor including both a JVM server and a JVM client.

cards.title: Creating an interactive website with Ktor
cards.description: Learn how to serve files, use templating engines such as Freemarker and the kotlinx.html DSL, and work with form input from Ktor.

cards.title: Building a Full Stack Web App with Kotlin Multiplatform
cards.description: Create an application with Kotlin/JVM and Kotlin/JS, and explore topics around code sharing, serialization, server- and client-side development.

cards.title: Introduction to Coroutines and Channels
cards.description:
Learn about coroutines in Kotlin and how you can communicate between 
them using channels.

cards.title: Introduction to Kotlin/Native
cards.description:
Create a simple HTTP client that can run natively on multiple
platforms using Kotlin/Native and libcurl.

cards.title: Kotlin/Native Concurrency
cards.description: Learn about the concurrency model in Kotlin/Native, and how to work with state in a multi-threaded environment.

cards.title: Kotlin Multiplatform Hands-on: Networking and Data Storage
cards.description: Learn how to create a mobile application for Android and iOS using Kotlin Multiplatform Mobile with Ktor and SQLDelight.

cards.title: Targeting iOS and Android with Kotlin Multiplatform
cards.description: Learn how to create a mobile application that can target both iOS and Android using Kotlin Multiplatform.
